column2: Innodata, Inc. is a global services and technology company, which combines human expertise with deep learning technologies to power information products and enterprise artificial intelligence and digital transformation. The company is headquartered in Ridgefield Park, New Jersey and currently employs 4,750 full-time employees. The firm operates under three segments: Digital Data Solutions (DDS), Synodex and Agility PR Solutions (Agility). Its DDS segment provides various services, such as data acquisition, transformation, and enrichment at scale; digital operations management and analytics, and content applications. Its Synodex segment delivers a software as a service (SaaS) platform and managed services for digital transformation of medical data. Its Agility segment delivers a SaaS platform and managed service for delivering news, information and content to targeted journalists and influencers. Agility Segment provides tools and related professional services that enable public relations (PR) and communications professionals to discover influencers, amplify messages, monitor coverage and measure the impact of campaigns. The firm serves banking and financial services, technology, digital retailing, healthcare, science, and insurance sector.
